Howdy, stranger!

Welcome to Mono Dew, my digital footprint. This is my nest where I incubate my thoughts that I hope would hatch into something meaningful someday.

I am Tushar Sharma. I am a avid blogger and voracious reader. I am passionate about FOSS, occasionally like to dip my pen into poetry and also harbour interest in literature. Also I spend my time solving interesting problems and compiling quotes of people that matter.

Peruse my resume →

Projects

I am a software developer. I am constantly learning and trying to make stuff. Some of my projects are either a part of my acedemics or a residue of my spare time.

Blog

As part of the planet, I feel inclined to share my opinion on everything that happens around me. Let me know what you think about them.
